p: The present work confirmed the antioxidant activity of the B persicum, E globulus, and rose water. Also, B persicum and E globulus essential oils and extracts had relatively high antimicrobial activity against Listeria spp. In addition, the essential oils can penetrate the cytoplasmic membrane, which causes a loss of the membrane permeability of the cellular membrane and leakage of the cytosolic materials. Therefore, it is suggested that the above extracts and essential oils used as a potential source of natural antibacterial agents against multidrug-resistant Listeria.
